texte: A fluffy cartoon monster with vivid pink fur and exaggerated features, standing at the center of the scene. The monster has large expressive eyes and a wide-open mouth filled with oversized sharp teeth, emphasizing an intense yet comical scream. Its long, wild hair enhances its quirky appearance. The ground is scattered with small fragments resembling broken stones or debris, suggesting a playful and chaotic setting. The background is a smooth black gradient that highlights the vibrant colors of the monster, creating strong contrast and depth.
